title.native: Have You Got It Yet? The Story of Syd Barrett and Pink Floyd

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Storm Thorgerson
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Follow the moment Barrett was kicked out of Pink Floyd, from the narrative of him going from groundbreaking musician to iconic rocker and manic, unstable star.
